languages.text: {n}Знать вокруг охает, дама в золотой маске гневно топает и вскидывает руки.{/n} "Да как вы... Я — потомственная дворянка! Я буду жаловаться губернатору!" {n}Вы слышите смешки — кажется, окружающие прекрасно понимают комичность подобных жалоб.{/n}

{n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The nobles gasp, and the woman in the golden mask stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — those gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of such complaints.{/n}

I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — those gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of such complaints.{/n}

I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

languages.text: {n}见此情形，所有贵族都倒吸一口冷气。戴着金色面具的女士跺着脚，挥着双臂。{/n}“你……你好大的胆子！我是贵族的后裔！我要向总督告状！”{n}随后，你听到了几声笑声。聚集在这里的人似乎都心知肚明，居然有人打算用这样的话来威胁你，这简直是荒诞不经。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}见此情形，所有贵族都倒吸一口冷气。戴着金色面具的女士跺着脚，挥着双臂。{/n}“你……你好大的胆子！我是贵族的后裔！我要向总督告状！”{n}随后，你听到了几声笑声。聚集在这里的人似乎都心知肚明，居然有人打算用这样的话来威胁你，这简直是荒诞不经。{/n}

languages.text: {n}貴族たちは息を呑み、女性は足を踏み鳴らして腕を振り回し始めた。{/n}「よくも…！私は由緒正しき貴族の血を引く者なのよ！このことは総督に訴えてやる！」{n}何人かの笑い声が聞こえた。ここに集まっている人々は、そんな訴えで脅そうとすること自体がいかに馬鹿げているかを楽しんでいるようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}貴族たちは息を呑み、女性は足を踏み鳴らして腕を振り回し始めた。{/n}「よくも…！私は由緒正しき貴族の血を引く者なのよ！このことは総督に訴えてやる！」{n}何人かの笑い声が聞こえた。ここに集まっている人々は、そんな訴えで脅そうとすること自体がいかに馬鹿げているかを楽しんでいるようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los nobles ahogan un grito mientras la mujer da un taconazo y empieza a agitar los brazos.{/n} «¡Cómo... se atreve! ¡Yo desciendo de un linaje noble! ¡Presentaré una queja ante el gobernador por esta afrenta!». {n}Oyes unas cuantas risotadas; la gente parece encontrar divertida la absurda pretensión de amenazarte con una reclamación formal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los nobles ahogan un grito mientras la mujer da un taconazo y empieza a agitar los brazos.{/n} «¡Cómo... se atreve! ¡Yo desciendo de un linaje noble! ¡Presentaré una queja ante el gobernador por esta afrenta!». {n}Oyes unas cuantas risotadas; la gente parece encontrar divertida la absurda pretensión de amenazarte con una reclamación formal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soylular nefeslerini tutar, kadın ise ayağını yere vurup kollarını sallamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ne cüretle!.. Ben soylu bir aileden geliyorum! Sizi valiye şikâyet edeceğim!" {n}Birkaç kahkaha duyuyorsun. Burada toplanan insanlar, seni böyle bir şikâyetle tehdit etmeye çalışmasının saçmalığının farkında gibi görünüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Soylular nefeslerini tutar, kadın ise ayağını yere vurup kollarını sallamaya başlıyor.{/n} "Ne cüretle!.. Ben soylu bir aileden geliyorum! Sizi valiye şikâyet edeceğim!" {n}Birkaç kahkaha duyuyorsun. Burada toplanan insanlar, seni böyle bir şikâyetle tehdit etmeye çalışmasının saçmalığının farkında gibi görünüyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les nobles poussent un cri de surprise, tandis que la femme tape du pied et commence à agiter les bras.{/n} « Comment... osez-vous ? Je descends d'une noble lignée ! Je me plaindrai au gouverneur en personne ! » {n}Vous entendez fuser quelques rires. Les gens rassemblés ici semblent mesurer l'absurdité d'une telle menace à votre endroit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les nobles poussent un cri de surprise, tandis que la femme tape du pied et commence à agiter les bras.{/n} « Comment... osez-vous ? Je descends d'une noble lignée ! Je me plaindrai au gouverneur en personne ! » {n}Vous entendez fuser quelques rires. Les gens rassemblés ici semblent mesurer l'absurdité d'une telle menace à votre endroit.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Adeligen schnappen nach Luft, während die Frau mit dem Fuß aufstampft und mit den Armen wedelt.{/n} "Wie ... könnt Ihr es wagen! Ich stamme aus einer langen Reihe von Adeligen! Ich werde mich beim Gouverneur darüber beschweren!" {n}Einige aus der Menge lachen – ihnen schneit die schiere Absurdität zu gefallen, dass jemand versucht, dir mit einer derartigen Beschwerde zu drohen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The nobles gasp, while the woman stamps her foot and starts flailing her arms.{/n} "How... dare you! I am a descendant of a noble line! I will complain to the governor about this!" {n}You hear a few laughs — the people gathered here seem to appreciate the sheer absurdity of anyone trying to threaten you with such a complaint.{/n}
